name: Cabin Madness
description:
This is a point-n-click adventure game created for the Cosmic Horrors Jam 2022. It is currently in rough draft state and will be updated with final content, music, and art post jam. 

Synopsis

Agatha Edgar is an author struggling to write her next great novel.  She moved to a creepy cabin with an occult history hoping to find inspiration.  Will she be successful, fall into her old habits, or go completely mad in this comedy Cosmic/Horror mash-up?

Credits 

  • Dan Hansen (SucculentBacon)- Game Design & Development
  • Joe Newman (Tyrano) - Story
  • Cormac Porter (MugillaGurilla) - Music - https://www.linkedin.com/in/cormac-porter-0a64701b2//
  • PowerQuest by Powerhoof (itch.io) - 2D Adventure Game Package for Unity
  • LACKING64 Palette (lospec.com) - for a attempted Cosmic Horror art vibe
